title: my phone auto forwards to my work when i dont answer
content: so my phone auto forwards when i dont answer it..i went into the phone app..clicked the dots,went into settings,advanced settings and i do NOT have the call forward option! what is going on with this phone..i also have other issues like switching to other screens or putting letters into the text box on its own...but lets focus with the call forwarding issue as the calls are going to my work! that is total bs
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
